item.title: New feature

item.description: Your client will: Filter, slice, dice and find insights Export key tables and visualization as editable PowerPoint objects, ready for presentation, all by themselves.

item.title: The new normal
item.description: Data import and prep Standard reporting Dashboard creation and deployment Automate tracker wave updates of data and dashboards for quick turnarounds Come learn where automation can speed up your survey analytics and reporting ‚ü∂
